title: Check out Santander...
content:
We love to spy on the textaxis website all the time hoping we’ll see splashed all over the homepage, “Quixote coming to Myfonts”.

Surely you’ve admired Batin and the sweet suite, Suite.

There is also another site which features graphic design from the Textaxis people.

[http://www.extraestudio.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011135/http:/www.extraestudio.com/ "http://www.extraestudio.com")

In this site you’ll see the custom face Santander:  
 [http://www.extraestudio.com/proyectos/santander.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011135/http:/www.extraestudio.com/proyectos/santander.htm "http://www.extraestudio.com/proyectos/santander.htm")

Like Plantin with out looking stubby.

Enjoy!

Mikey :-)
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content:
Iñigo jerez has some nice potential as a type designer. Unfortunately, last we spoke it seemed like he was concentrating on other things right now.

It’s not a replacement, but if you like Quixote, have a look at [Custodia](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011135/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/ourtype/custodia_ot/).
